column6: Our condo is fully furnished with all your needs as well as a great view of the ocean. The property has two pools, bbq areas and it's location is perfect for the beach, fishing, wind surfing, restaurant, bars as well as other entertainment. great restaurants, bars, or grocery stores within 10-15 minutes. Aquarium within 10 minutes. USS Lexington within view. Beach chairs and umbrella in closet.
